title: Masteries Gone
body:
Hi,

In the latest patch update all my mastery levels are gone, and in the game I just played they didn't register any experience points. This must be a bug in the new patch as they were working fine yesterday. Just thought I should let Riot know so they can address the problem.

replies.body: Almost had an aneurysm because I thought they reset it.

"This is a purely visual bug with the patch and is known at this time - your mastery scores are still safe and sound in the back end, but the "collection" page isn't displaying them correctly"

- Riot Eambo

I just want to know if I'll get my mastery 7 token even though i got an s+ during this time, think riot will give me my token after the fact?

I would imagine that's along the same lines, being that it's just not showing properly on the client end, but is still updating in the back end. That said, if it gets to a point where the issue has been resolved and you've not received a token (or tokens) you're sure you should have, you can submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and they should be able to help.

Happy to say the bug has been fixed with a small update. cheers.

Same as the status button, you cant swap between active and away, the patch shipped with a few client bugs. The real question is why the shen bug wasn't fixed, he literally loses two spell effects if he is on his spirit blade when casting spells, full cds on them.
Mine are gone in the collection page
I found that I still accumulated champion points, it just doesn't show it in the collection tab. Might just be a problem with the UI... spaghetti code?
